posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tim
I'm trying to put together a Boston National T206 set of all players with all possible backs.

I have a few but many are needed.  

I'm looking for common backs in VG to EX

Tougher backs in any condition.

If you have any to offer please email me a price and scan.

Thanks abravefan@msn.com

Here is a list of my current needs.  I'm at 43/174
